topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: dircproxy
short_description: dircproxy is a detachable IRC proxy server that keeps you on IRC logs private and channel messages while you are detached then when you reconnect, spools them to you as if you hadn't been away.
